The Kentucky Senate is poised to vote on one of the most restrictive abortion bans in the country.
Take Action Now

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The 2019 Kentucky General Assembly just got underway on Tuesday and already the Kentucky Senate is poised to take a vote on a 6-week abortion ban.

Contact your senator now and ask them to vote against this harmful abortion ban.

Senate Bill 9 would ban abortion at an early point in pregnancy before many people even know they are pregnant. This unconstitutional abortion ban is the latest extreme step by Kentucky politicians to put abortion care out of reach in the commonwealth. If passed, it would be one of the most restrictive abortion bans in the entire country.

Email your senator right now before Senate Bill 9 is heard in committee. Once the bill is heard it will be eligible for a vote in the full Senate and could pass before the end of the week.

Thank you for taking this emergency action to protect reproductive freedom in the Commonwealth.

Sincerely,

ACLU of Kentucky
